any number between those

item.title: [Dementhium 639] Getting a player to type in an int inside a dialogue box
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I am trying to add a jackpot minigame but I don’t know how to take it from going into the command prompt to go to the game
It’s this thats making it go into the cmd prmpt but I don’t wanna remove until I know how to make so you need to type the in in your chat box or interface

[code=java] if (command[0].equals(“jackpot”)) {
int number;

            Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);

            player.sendMessage("Guess the ammount in the Pot.");
            player.sendMessage("If you get the number right you earn that ammount of cash!");
            player.sendMessage("Hint: Its between 1M and 100M");               
                            number = in.nextInt();
    if (number != 50000000) {
            player.sendMessage("You picked " + number + " coins!");
            player.sendMessage("You guessed wrong.");
    } else if(number == 50000000) {
	if (player.getInventory().getContainer().getFreeSlots() >= 1) {
            player.sendMessage("you are awesome! You picked the right ammount.");
            player.sendMessage("You got " + number + " coins!");
            player.sendMessage("You are The JackPot Winner!");
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, number);
	} else {
			player.sendMessage("You need atleast 1 inventory slot empty to recieve your reward.");
    }
}[/code]

[youtube]http://youtu.be/kWZsf-yY4ME[/youtube]

Read full topic
